## Linear Model

Using the mtcars dataset we can get the following plot

```{r}
data("mtcars")
library(plotly)

plot_ly(mtcars, x = ~hp) %>%
    add_markers(y = ~mpg, text = rownames(mtcars), showlegend = F) %>%
    add_lines(y = ~fitted(lm(mpg~hp)), name = "Linear Model", showlegend = TRUE) %>%
    layout(xaxis= list(title="Horse Power"),
           yaxis= list(title="Miles per Gallon"),
           legend = list(x = 0.8, y = 0.9),
           title = "Relationship between HP and MPG")
```
